Package cellularAutomata

Class Summary
AbstractCAFactory Creates sets of related objects that work together to create a particular type of CA.
CAConstants Constants used by the CA.
CAController Controls moment by moment actions of the CA, as directed by user input from the graphics.
CAControllerListener Listens for events fired from the GUI and takes appropriate action like starting and stopping the simulation.
CAFactory Creates a factory for instantiating the CA lattice, lattice graphics, rule, and file storage.
CAPrinter Contains a method to print the cellular automaton.
CAShutDown Handles shutdown operations such as saving properties to a file and cleaning up resources.
CASplash Displays a splash page for the application.
CAStateInitializer Creates initial states for cells.
Cell Contains all of the information about the state of a cell, previous states of the cell, rule(s) for changing state, and the current generation or time step (number of updates that have occurred).
CurrentProperties Stores the properties of the current running simulation.
